mine.description: You are in the living room of what looks like a small spaceship's crew quarters. The metal walls hum faintly. A mechanic stands by a rusty console, wiping grease from their hands. Nearby, you spot Zeke, an old friend of Nova's, leaning against the viewport. Against the far wall is a sturdy Tinkering Table covered in tools and spare parts. Orion is in the corner making it weird.
